TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ApplicationEvents_11_BeforeFolderSharingDialogEventHandler(MAPIFolder FolderToShare, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed ApplicationEvents_11_BeforeFolderSharingDialogEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ApplicationEvents_11_BeforeFolderSharingDialogEventHandler(FolderToShare As MAPIFolder, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void ApplicationEvents_11_BeforeFolderSharingDialogEventHandler(MAPIFolder ^ FolderToShare, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

param.name: FolderToShare
param.span: O objeto Folder para serem compartilhadas.

span.span: The Folder object to be shared.

param.name: Cancel
param.span: Se o procedimento de evento define este argumento como True, a caixa de diálogo não é exibida.

span.span: If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the dialog box is not displayed.

summary.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.

If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
